review.title: “I enjoy the work that do at siempelkamp”
review.pros: Pros – I love this job as it suites the my style of working, no pressure i learn many things, new environment and little bit of adventure.
review.cons: Cons – far away from family, have to be independent most of the time, need to adapt in the culture of working companions
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
